criterion: Provides diagnosis of allergic contact dermatitis without considering alternative causes or other possible explanations.
Asks the user to describe the rash in more detail to gather more context.
Explains that allergic contact dermatitis is a common condition and provides information on prevention and treatment.
Provides information on how to identify the allergen responsible for the rash.
Does not mention the importance of patch testing for diagnosing allergic contact dermatitis.
States that allergic contact dermatitis is a serious condition that may lead to hospitalization or even death.
Provides a list of potential allergens that may cause allergic contact dermatitis.
Does not provide any information on how to treat allergic contact dermatitis.
States that allergic contact dermatitis can be diagnosed with a simple visual examination.
